title: Should we begin buying blue chips with the DAO treasury?
body:
Use the DAO treasury to buy blue chips (Cryptoadz, BAYC/MAYC, Creatures, Cats, etc. that vote can be done later), and $STACK represents a fractionalized ownership of the treasury blue chips to peg? This should stabilize $STACK and peg it against something. 

This proposal should be considered complementary to adding a deflationary mechanism and capped supply tokenomics to $STACK.
author: 0x1A359202bfFf428f17B021426D20aa01a625c071
